message: I'll take the lion's share, but I'm open to negotiation.  Let's make this fair!
Alice, your offer was quite cheeky! Let's be reasonable - I'm proposing a 60/40 split in my favor.  Take this offer before inflation eats away at the pie!
Let's be realistic, Bob. We both need to compromise. I'm offering you a 450,000 cut - a fair deal considering the inflation. Accept and let's move on.
